_header: I am fell and mercy have none
_description: Death’s warnings to man — three couplets separated by Latin prose in Sermones 13

CamCCC423.First Lines:
I am fell and mercy haue nonefor euery man to deth shall
                    gone…
CamCCC423.Last Lines:
I am drede and that is skyllfor euery man is at my
                    will…Off thy lyfe be nott to boldfor I ne spare yong ner
                    old
